items.sentence: I've finished translating everything that you asked me to translate.
Only one competitor can emerge from the crucible of losers' bracket.
Tom and Mary were speaking in French, so I couldn't understand them.
Tom gathered his dirty clothes and put them into the laundry basket.
Excuse me, could you please tell me how to get to the train station?
There's a saying that you can judge people by the company they keep.
The food that was dropped from the helicopter is what kept us alive.
Could you turn the music down a bit? I'm trying to concentrate here!
When it comes to exercise, even a short walk is better than nothing.
Do you think we'll be able to solve that problem in the near future?
